text: The 1070s BC is a decade which lasted from 1079 BC to 1070 BC. ==Events and trends== * 1079 BC—Death of Zhou cheng wang, King of the Zhou Dynasty of China. * 1078 BC—Zhou kang wang becomes King of the Zhou Dynasty of China. * c. 1075 BC—New Kingdom ends in Ancient Egypt (Another date is 1200 BC). ==Significant people==
title: 1070s BC
